# animate --- Animate Graphics {#animate}

`r CiteDate(20200220)` See <https://github.com/gjwgit/animate> for details.

This package illustrates the effectiveness of animations in adding
insight to any data analysis. Animations are shown to communicate
quite effectively the story that the data is telling.

A sports animation based on data from the International Association of
Athletics Federations (IAAF) is used.

```{bash eval=FALSE}
$ ml install animate
```

```{bash eval=FALSE}
$ ml configure animate
```

```{bash eval=FALSE}
$ ml demo animate
```
